about_the_game:
🔍 Discover the Unique Treasure Hunt Mechanism
Unlike traditional hidden object games, "Dual Discovery: Unite Challenge" offers you an entirely new treasure-hunting experience! Each mission item is cleverly split into two parts, scattered throughout the picture. When you find one part, it follows your mouse cursor, creating a subtle interaction as if engaging in a delicate dance with you.

🔗 Piece Together the Truth
Once you've found both fragments, it's time to assemble them. As the two pieces come together perfectly and emit a dazzling light, congratulations—you've successfully uncovered the mysterious item! This sense of achievement will accompany you throughout the game.

🎮 Easy to Play Right Out of the Box
The simple and intuitive gameplay allows you to dive in effortlessly. Just click and drag to enjoy the thrill of searching and piecing together. Whether you're a die-hard fan of hidden object games or a newcomer who loves puzzle adventures, you'll find your joy in this game!

Embark on your adventure in "Dual Discovery: Unite Challenge" now! 🚀 Every moment of successful assembly is a testament to your wisdom and courage!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with OpenGL 3.3 Support or better, Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: processor and operating system, 2.2Ghz quad-core or more
  • Graphics: Intel GMA 950
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
